column2: "Don't play dumb. If you don't understand now, you will soon."
"But \"Ruins\"...that's an interesting name for this place."
"What a nice way for the ARKS to word it. Makes me sick!"
"Where's Sina? You can tell by looking, can't you? She's not here."
"But you don't seem to understand the situation, if you think you have time to worry about someone else."
"Gahahaha...haha! You're almost ready. You've gotten a lot stronger."
"But I can't rush it. Just a little longer."
"Because something a lot more fun is about to happen. I wouldn't want to spoil it."
"What's going to happen? Don't worry about it, just go about your own business."
"Bwahahaha! Things are about to get a lot more interesting!"
